author: Brodie Robertson
description:
You may have heard by now about the recent Rust for Linux drama and of course I'm going to talk about it, this sitcom is way more entertaining than anything hollywood has made in there entire life. Hector Martin of the Asahi Linux project crashed out, everyone decided to roast him and the kernel is a mess.

title: Rust Is Splitting The Linux Kernel In Half
